body.p: IFRS 16 requires a lessor to allocate the consideration in a contract to lease components and non-lease components applying the requirements in IFRS 15 on allocating the transaction price to performance obligations. This approach will ensure consistency for entities that are both a lessor and a seller of goods or services in the same contract. The IASB concluded that the approach applied by a lessor should not be different from the approach applied by a seller to allocate consideration in a revenue contract with more than one performance obligation.
